0110001101100010 0010100111010011 1 -> sum: 1000110100110110, cout: 0
0100010001011110 0010001101010110 1 -> sum: 0110011110110101, cout: 0
0011111001111101 0010011100110111 0 -> sum: 0110010110110100, cout: 0
1010101000101101 1101100100101101 1 -> sum: 1000001101011011, cout: 1
0111010100001101 1001000110101010 1 -> sum: 0000011010111000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
